holidays.title: Birthday of Emperor Akihito

holidays.description: Pfeffernusse are very delicious, appealing, and fairly easy to pronounce.

holidays.description: Delve into and reflect on their family’s heritage, history, and ancestry.

holidays.description: Haim is still remembered for his filmography and talent, years after his passing.
